title: Apple Product Marketing Manager, India
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just build products— they craft the kind of wonder that has revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Imagine what you could do here. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it. A job at Apple ...
description:
-  Articulate the product opportunity in market and provide product insight and leadership from introduction through end-of-life to both the Marketing and Sales organisations.
-  Execute product launches with excellence every time.
-  Contribute to the annual Marketing plan, outlining opportunity and actions that lead growth and category leadership.
-  Be the liaison between Market and worldwide for all local business needs and feature requireme...
key_qualifications:
Builds strong customer relationships and delivers customer-centric solutions.
Ability to surprise and delight our customers’ experiences through innovative, thoughtful details.
Uses knowledge of business drivers, how strategies and tactics play out in the market, to guide actions.
Builds partnerships and works collaboratively with others to meet shared objectives.
education_experience: Bachelor’s degree required. MS/MA/MBA preferred but not conditional
additional_requirements:
-  10+ years experience in product marketing, mobile communications and/or roles that require technical fluency and the instinctive ability to be the voice of the consumer
-  Excellent analytical skills
-  Depth of technical awareness
-  Strategic planning expertise
-  Superior storytelling capabilities
-  Presentation/negotiation skills
-  Spoken and written English proficiency
-  Prior work with international teams in a multi-national company is a plus
